name: Sky Rocketeer
description:
You broke free from the boredom of your life.
You don't care about what's happening to you.
You love your job.
You're totally mad.

In the year 2025, a youngster called Larry Burns is tired of his convenient life in the upper class. He decides to escape and takes a job as a test pilot for a pre-alpha jetpack suit developed by some totally sane and trustworthy scientists. Help Larry to survive his day at work!
